text: A Catholic crusade is targetting your lands! Your men are motivated to defend their homeland from the infidels to the death if necessary.
A new emperor now reigns in the Holy Roman Empire, having usurped the title with the backing of the Pope.
Armenia has finally been reconquered by the true Armenians - Now they are poised to become a true power!
Constantinople is now back in Roman hands. No pretender may now claim the imperial title - only you can now be called Emperor - Basileios - of the Romans.
Cuman migrants have now settled in your land, allowing the recruitment of their units.
Due to a lack of required manpower in this force's region for one or more of its population classes, it is no longer able to replenish.
Due to being at sea, this non-naval force is no longer able to replenish.

His Holiness believes the flames of eternal damnation are too good for you.
His Holiness feels neither ill will or good will towards you.

His Holiness will not suffer you to be mentioned in his presence.

Nobles within your realm are outraged by your imprudence, as they do not trust the arriving Cumans.
Normandy is Angevin again, all hail the King!
Only one independent region of the Holy Roman Empire remains.
The Black Death ravages this force, killing its soldiers in droves. The infected die after weeks of agonising buboes, gangrene and seizures.
The Black Death ravages this region, killing its inhabitants in droves. The infected die after weeks of agonising buboes, gangrene and seizures.
The bureaucrats of Persia enforce the Khan's authority and its chroniclers give him praise - the wealth and prosperity of the Persian world is yours!
The emperor has decreed that all suitable men of fighting age throughout the empire should be levied into the imperial armies.

The emperor has decreed that the burden of taxes shall be lessened in order to lessen the hardships of the empire's subjects.

The emperor has decreed that the bureaucracy of the empire will be expanded, resulting in greater administrative efficiency.

The Golden Bull of 1222 limits the authority of the crown, but appeases the nobility.
The Holy Roman Empire has been fully occupied by your forces.
The Iberian peninsula is united - Hispania may now take a central role in both the Mediterranean and the Atlantic frontier!
The King of England is no coward!
The Magna Carta is in effect for the entire reign of your king.
The Moors have been vaniquished from the Iberian peninsula, leaving the Christian kings lording over it triumphant.
The Nobility are enraged at the refusal of the King to pass the Golden Bull of 1222.
The occupation of this region has been deemed unlawful by the Holy Roman Emperor.
The Piast realms have been united - Poland's future is secured!
The Steppes belong to you - the world shall tremble at the thunder of hooves that comes with the horde.
The victory at Las Navas de Tolosa has inspired your troops!
These are dark days to follow the Christian God. The Holy See has been displaced, the Pope has been forced to flee and all of Christendom has been thrown into disarray.
This army is financed by the Great Khan himself, and as such will not require upkeep for a limited amount of time.
This army is financed by Timur himself, and as such will not require upkeep for a limited amount of time.
This force is on Crusade, providing a myriad of benefits. However, there are also drastic penalties for this force if fighting Catholic factions, so beware!
This force will hold key cities from the Crusaders at all costs.

You declared war against the Papal States, causing the Pope to rally the support of good Christians everywhere against you. They are rising up together in condemnation of your actions.
You have failed in fulfilling your holy vows, angering some within your realm.
You have failed to protect your lands from the Catholic onslaught, and now the crusaders have capture their target. This defeat has dealt a great blow to your legitimacy as a ruler.
You have lost the secrets to greek fire are are no longer able to recruit or supply units that use it.
You have succeeded in fulfilling your holy vows, greatly inspiring true believers in your realm.
You have succeeded in repelling the Crusaders from your lands, shattering their resolve... for now...
You hold a majority of the important centers of the spice trade, bringing your lands many riches.
You hold a near-monopoly on the spice trade, making you one of the wealthiest powers in the world.
You hold an important center of the spice trade with the east, netting you additional income through tariffs.
You hold two important centers of spice trade, strengthening your trade position.
Your domination of the spice trade is absolute, cementing your status as a great power.
Your lack of piety is seen as sinful, as you did not attend the Hajj.

Your leader has truly fallen out of favour with the Pope, who has deemed it necessary to excommunicate him from the Catholic Church.\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]This punishment will last until the end of your current faction leaderâ€™s reign.[[/col]]
Your victory over the English is an inspiration to your people!
This force is composed of Cathar rebels opposing the Albigensian Crusade!
This force is composed of rebels opposing the King of England's decision to reject the Magna Carta!
This force of rebels is newly raised and will not suffer desertion attrition for some time.
The holiest city in all Islam has fallen to the infidel. The ramifications of this can be felt throughout the Muslim world.
Your occupation of Mecca has severely angered Muslims across the world. The diplomatic ramifications of this will be severe.
As part of your faction's territories, the Islamic holy city of Mecca is under your protection. This fact is not unappreciated by the Muslim world.
